name: Picker
description: Picker Component, support single or multiple selection, blurModel and native wheel picker

props.description: Picker current value

props.name: onChange
props.description: Callback for when picker value change

props.name: mode
props.description: SINGLE mode or MULTI mode

props.name: fieldType
props.description: Pass for different field type UI (form, filter or settings)

props.name: selectionLimit
props.description: Limit the number of selected items

props.name: enableModalBlur
props.description: Adds blur effect to picker modal

props.name: renderPicker
props.description: Render custom picker - input will be value (see above)\Example:\renderPicker = \(selectedItem) => \{...\}\

props.name: renderItem
props.description: Render custom picker item

props.name: renderCustomTopElement
props.description: Render custom top element

props.name: renderCustomModal
props.description: Render custom picker modal

props.name: customPickerProps
props.description: Custom picker props (when using renderPicker, will apply on the button wrapper)

props.name: onPress
props.description: Add onPress callback for when pressing the picker

props.name: getLabel
props.description: A function that returns the label to show for the selected Picker value

props.name: topBarProps
props.description: The picker modal top bar props

props.name: showSearch
props.description: Show search input to filter picker items by label

props.name: searchStyle
props.description: Style object for the search input (only when passing showSearch)

props.name: searchPlaceholder

props.name: onSearchChange
props.description: Callback for picker modal search input text change (only when passing showSearch)

props.name: renderCustomSearch
props.description: Render custom search input (only when passing showSearch)

props.name: useWheelPicker
props.description: Use wheel picker instead of a list picker

props.name: listProps
props.description: Pass props to the list component that wraps the picker options (allows to control FlatList behavior)

props.name: pickerModalProps
props.description: Pass props to the picker modal

props.name: useSafeArea
props.description: Add safe area in the Picker modal view

props.name: items
props.description: Data source for Picker

props.name: showLoader
props.description: Show a loader (while items are loading/fetching)

props.name: customLoaderElement
props.description: Custom loader element

hero.title: Picker
hero.description: Picker allows the user to select an option from a variety of choices available.Pressing the Picker Field, will open a dialog or modal displaying a list of available options for selection.

sections.title: Usage Example
sections.description: Pickers allow selection of an option or multiple options from a list usually displayed using an actionSheet. Pickers can be used in forms, settings screens or as part of an interactive flow.

items.title: Form Field (default)
items.description: Mainly used as part of a form, works cohesively with the text field component and other form related components.

items.title: Filter Field
items.description:
Used mostly for filtering a screen or part of it. Can be combined with search functionality.
The colon symbol in the Label is not part of the component itself and should be included as part of the text string.

items.title: Settings Field
items.description:
Based on ListItem component.
Used mostly when the picker is part of a settings screen.

sections.title: Picker Types
sections.description: Various types of pickers are available to accommodate different needs and use cases.

items.title: Modal
items.description: Used for longer lists like country selection, currency selection or a language picker.

sections.title: Picker Values display options
sections.description: The Picker component serves as an entry point to a list of selectable values, usually displayed in a modal or a dialog.

items.title: Single selection
items.description: Tapping on an item will select it and close the dialog. In scrollable long lists, the selected item will be displayed at the top of the list to stay visible.

items.title: Multi-select
items.description: In multi-select dialogs, a clear CTA for “Done” or “Save” is required to confirm the selection and dismiss the dialog.

sections.title: Values displayed in Dialog
sections.description: The Picker component serves as an entry point to a list of selectable values, usually displayed in a modal or a dialog.

items.title: Maximum Selected
items.description: When the user reaches the limited amount of options allowed to select, the non-selected options will become disabled to restrict the user from selecting more options.

items.title: Validation Error
items.description:
markdown:Product can set the minimum amount for the selected options. If the user selects less options than the minimum:  
- Display a validation error in the picker header. The error text should explain the user should select at least one option.
- The dialog CTA will become disabled.
- If the user will close the dialog, the changes won’t be saved.
- When the user selects the minimum required options, the validation error will disappear and the CTA will become active.

items.title: Loading Data
items.description:
If the data can't be loaded before opening the dialog, a Loader should be shown to let the user know that content is being fetched.
The search input is hidden while loading.
Since the number of items to be loaded is unpredictable, a fixed spacing of 120px below and above the loader has been set.

items.title: Single selection
items.description:
Tapping on one of the list items will select it and close the modal. The CTA is optional and disabled by default. It can be added in cases where users might not expect or want the modal to auto-dismiss upon selection.
The selected Item is hoisted on top of long lists by default (placed above other values). This can also be set for short lists.
A search bar can be added on top of the values list.

items.title: Multi-select
items.description: In multi-selection dialogs, a CTA for “Done” or “Save” is required to confirm the selection and dismiss the modal.

items.title: Select all
items.description: Providing a clear “select all” action is a good practice. In case all items are selected, display a “clear all” action. Make sure items number is clearly displayed according to the selection.

items.title: Select all checkbox
items.description:
In some cases, using checkbox for the “select all” action will be more appropriate. Note that “select all” checkbox can use an “indeterminate” state, if needed. 
Make sure that selected items number is clearly displayed.

items.title: Loading Data
items.description:
If the data can't be loaded prior to opening the modal, a Loader should be shown, indicating that content is being fetched.
Search input is hidden while loading, and the loader is aligned to the center of the screen.

sections.title: Values displayed in Modal
sections.description: This type of selection list is used for long lists, e.g. contacts, countries and currencies.

sections.title: Picker Presets
sections.description: Pickers allow selection of an option/value or multiple options/values from a list. Pickers can be used in forms, settings screens or as part of an interactive flow.
